name: webmbed
title: WebMbed
description: WebMbed for vozForums is an extension for Firefox that embeds WebM videos in posts on vozForums (muted, looping indefinitely like a GIF)

preferences.name: muted
preferences.title: Mute
preferences.description: Defines whether a WebM video should be muted when playing

preferences.name: loop
preferences.title: Loop
preferences.description: Plays the video in a loop

preferences.name: controls
preferences.title: Show Controls
preferences.description: Shows controls like volume, play button etc.

preferences.name: nsfw
preferences.title: Show NSFW videos
preferences.description: If set, show the splash image of videos marked NSFW

preferences.name: mode
preferences.title: Video start behavior
preferences.description: When autoplay is enabled, videos will automatically play when they become visible, and pause when they are not
